Join Andreas Fertig and Master Safe C++ for Embedded Systems in Just 2 Days

Attend CppCon 2025 in Aurora, Colorado and join the "Safe and Efficient C++ for Embedded Environments" pre-conference class on the 13th-14th September to deep dive into modern C++ techniques. Learn how to write efficient and safe code without heap allocations, specifically tailored for embedded systems design. This workshop is perfect for any embedded developer looking to improve their skills.

FREE one hour preview! - https://youtu.be/kDZKo9Om6lQ?feature=shared

Course Description
As a developer working with embedded systems, you need tools that help you build smarter, more efficient software. And that’s exactly what the latest C++ updates deliver. With these advancements, tackling the challenges of embedded environments—like those that follow MISRA, Autosar, or SIL—becomes easier. You can meet the strictest standards without sacrificing performance or reliability.

This course will
